text: there might be a way to mathematically
prove that time doesn't exist time
actually has quite a mathematical
quality to it because when you're trying
to keep track of time you're trying to
spot something that's maybe repeating
that then you can use that to mark the
passage of time and spotting things that
repeat or have patterns in them is
really what mathematics is all about
there might be a way to mathematically
prove that time doesn't exist because if
you take the laws of physics it's
actually possible to write all of these
laws to take time out of the equation so
maybe time is just a human invention
it's sometimes called an emergent
property that it isn't really there at
all but I think most of us have a strong
sense that there is something flowing
which we call time but what it really is
we're not really too sure
[Music]
